Script: The One with the Unexpected Engagement Monica and Chandler’s Apartment. Monica and Chandler are sitting on the couch, looking through a vacation brochure.] This resort looks amazing. Oh, come on, it’ll be fun. Besides, we need this vacation to relax and get away from everything. You mean, get away from Joey eating all our food and Rachel stealing your clothes? Exactly!  But seriously, Chandler, we need to make a decision soon. They have limited spots available. Okay, let’s do it.  We could use a break from the madness. Central Perk.
